blueprint_book.label: Space Exploration (v0.6.13)
blueprint_book.description:
Blueprints for Space Exploration games that use the "self building" system from my self-building-factory:
https://factorioprints.com/view/-MNZWdWosuqr3vtaC2hD

0.6.13:
* Moved landing pad in Colony Home for better recovery of crashed rockets.
* Added wood recycling (to green circuits) to Mall.
* Have Refinery accept 4-car coal trains.
* Fixed hold of 3 reactors in Refinery.
